updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services from #YewTee towards #JurongEast are now operating normally. Trains and platforms may be crowded.
[NSL]: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #YewTee to #JurongEast towards JurongEast due to train fault.
[NSL]: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #ChoaChuKang to #JurongEast towards JurongEast due to train fault.
